channel.title: Need A WORKING Complier
channel.description:
Hey there. I am having some problems with my Complier. When the screen is prompt, it says:
Please chose an option below to do that function. Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for any updates that I post.
c - Compile your server. r - To run your server. e - To exit out of the program. color - Change the Text and Background colors of this complier. reset - Resets your Complier Logs.
option:
Then I do the option: C. And then it comes up and says I do not have Java JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. But I DO! Does anyone know a GOOD complier that WILL WORK? If you do, PLEASE post it here!
Thank you.

item.title: Need A WORKING Complier
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Fait Ancient Fait
item.description:
@Ancient_Fait wrote:

I have _03. And when i used your complier i changed _04 to _03 so :\

Read full topic

item.title: Need A WORKING Complier
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Start > Run >
Type in
C:\Program Files\Java\Jdk
And it should show the versions of JDK you have.
Tell me which one you have. And tell me the complete path.

Read full topic

item.title: Need A WORKING Complier
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Fait Ancient Fait
item.description:
@Ancient_Fait wrote:

P I M P 3 D, I used your complier but it did and sad the SAME EXACT thing as mine, but it had a differnt code :\\ Do I have any more compliers??

Read full topic

item.title: Need A WORKING Complier
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

@echo off title compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" ./files/*.java pause
I just realized how ancient my JDK version is. xD
Should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Need A WORKING Complier

item.description:
@Ancient_Fait wrote:

Hey there. I am having some problems with my Complier. When the screen is prompt, it says:

Please chose an option below to do that function.
Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
any updates that I post.

c - Compile your server.
r - To run your server.
e - To exit out of the program.
color - Change the Text and Background colors of this complier.
reset - Resets your Complier Logs.

option:
